fact.text: St4r and Smurfton were in a boy band once. They had one hit called "Touching Tubes".
St4r will do a Firebrand cosplay stream at 1k followers.
To this day, St4r can not make it through Rudy without crying.
St4r suffers from anatidaephobia. Google it.
St4r is unnaturally hairy due to a friend putting Rogaine in his body wash during his formative years.
The WR for Sex any% is 00:02 by St4rsurfer. (Any% is where the girl doesn't have to finish.) #condomskipftw
St4r whistles on stream to cover up the sound of him farting.
